description:
Our Mission

Casper & de Toledo LLC is a Stamford, Connecticut, law firm with a highly respected reputation in personal injury and employment law. We believe that the judicial system should work for everyone - including accident victims and wronged employees. Our mission is to effectively uphold our clients' rights and to pursue the maximum amount of compensation available to them under the law.

Tenaciously committed to the success of our clients' cases, we take pride in using innovative strategies to obtain favorable resolutions. As a testimony to our high-quality services and the esteem in which we are held, many of our clients are referred by health care providers and other lawyers.

Our Attorneys

Attorney Stewart Casper formerly served as president of the Connecticut Trial Lawyers Association, while attorney Victoria de Toledo is past president of the Connecticut Employment Lawyers Association.

From 2010 through 2014, U.S. News & World Report designated our partners at the top of their fields. Our lawyers have also been listed in Super Lawyers magazine from 2006 through 2014, repeatedly listed in The Best Lawyers in America and featured in the Litchfield County Times article "Justice for All: an Insider's Guide to the Legal World in Western Connecticut."

Our Focus

Within personal injury law, we work with world-renowned specialists to fully develop cases involving motor vehicle accidents, product liability, premises liability and sexual abuse. We also handle medical malpractice cases involving birth defects, nursing home abuse, surgical errors and other types of negligence.

Within employment law, our law firm represents employees in cases involving discrimination, sexual harassment, wrongful termination, whistleblower claims and more.

Contact the Stamford office of Casper & de Toledo LLC to learn more or to schedule a complimentary consultation today.
